descriptionHtml:
v1.2 should now be enchantable with charge = 7000
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
v1.1 consists of improved normal map in an attempt to remove the wierd distortion on the blade around the metal round thing above the hilt. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is my second uploaded mod. This here is The Executioner Blade that Zabuza one of the legendary seven swordsmen of the Mist used. Its two handed and pretty much like a daedric greatsword. For aesthetic purposes and not meant to be lorefriendly. 
Craftable under Daedric smithing category and should be enchantable. 
Added a version with axe animations instead of greatsword. 
If you like naruto weapons check out my other mod Hidans Scythe here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16401

Niro\'s video featuring my mod: 
[youtube]hTRTYqPcOfo[/youtube]

If you want to hold it over your shoulder like zabuza did in the anime use this animation replacer mod:  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16351#content

My mods:
Hidans Scythe - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16401
Infinity Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17255
Legion Helmet - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18341
Phoenix Katana - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16935
Stormfang Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18494
Grayson Sword - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17552
Zabuzas Executioner Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16753
author: siberok92
